comprehensive_overview: BamTools is a software toolkit for manipulating BAM (Binary Alignment Map) files. It provides both a C++ API for BAM file input and output, and a command-line tool for performing various operations on BAM files.
core_features: Efficient BAM file reading and writing
Tools for filtering, sorting, merging, indexing BAM files
Support for extracting regions, statistics, and alignments from BAM files
